plot: Trapped face-to-face with the Punisher, Daredevil wrestles with the morality of vigilante justice. Meanwhile, Foggy and Karen work to save the firm.

Daredevil finds himself chained on a rooftop, which gives him the opportunity to have a face to face conversation with his captor, The Punisher. Meanwhile, Foggy is trying to locate Matt, while Karen is digging district attorney's files about Frank Castle/ The Punisher.—DimitrisVelen
